sources.title: House Busters (1952)
sources.description: The Talking Magpies, Heckle and Jeckle, are working as professional house-wreckers, and they run up against an escapee, wanted-criminal bulldog who is hiding out in a house they have been hired to demolish. Before the confusion and destruction that follows his discovery, the bulldog wishes he had stayed in jail. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/house-busters-1952/

metadata.Plot: The Talking Magpies, Heckle and Jeckle, are working as professional house-wreckers, and they run up against an escapee, wanted-criminal bulldog who is hiding out in a house they have been hired to demolish. Before the confusion and destruction that follows his discovery, the bulldog wishes he had stayed in jail.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
